website_summaries.verdict: The Puma 1948 Vulc Trainers are used as an all-around everyday shoe with its simple, classic, and clean silhouette. Due to the comfort and great fit it provides, it is a staple for regular use to school or sporting it at work. Its great-looking low profile style, combined with equitable quality, had satisfied many customers and sure would leave them craving for more.
pros: Comfort is topnotch when it comes to rating the Puma 1948 Vulc Trainers as most of the users attest it with distinct appreciation
A very large number of users praise the shoe’s good looks
Compared to some shoes in the market, a lot of buyers are relieved with the very reasonable price of the model
The shoe distinguishes an excellent low profile look combined with excellent quality
Some users describe the shoe as excellent, awesome, and perfect
Color combinations of the shoe is an eye-catching trait, and several users love its colorways
A small number of customers are overwhelmed with the Puma 1948 Vulc Trainers’ simple low top yet vintage silhouette
More than a handful of buyers describe the shoe as lightweight
The shoe is true to size and fits perfectly for most users
cons: The shoe exhibits a fairly poorer quality as compared to previous Puma models, and several insulted users even experience wearing off of the material in the shoes' early stages
According to a small number of customers, the shoe doesn’t provide breathability and after hours of wearing it their feet would either smell or sweat profusely
The shoe has a wide toe room, more than a handful of buyers have expressed

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable coolness
customer_reviews.text: I am used to the classic suede, but decided to try these for a change. The fit is the same but they are extremely lightweight. It's like wearing slippers. I like this aspect but it may mean they might ware out quicker....we shall see. The color is great, though it does say 'blue depths' so I was expecting a very dark dark navy. They are more of a bright navy color, but I really like it! It's different. Delivery time was excellent. I ordered on a Tuesday and received them in the Netherlands on the Friday.
customer_reviews.author: MRS I CRAWFORD

customer_reviews.title: A bit of stitching has come loose.
customer_reviews.text: My son really love these. He said they are comfortable and easy to wear. A small bit of stitching has come undone, which really surprised me, as there're a reputable make and still very new. I still give them 5 stars, because apart from that they are really great and hopefully it's a one off.
customer_reviews.author: ginette w

customer_reviews.title: They were more comfortable. The soles have changed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a year ago, but it was the higher ones. They were more comfortable. The soles have changed. I don't like these as well as last ones.
customer_reviews.author: squalf

customer_reviews.title: Trendy, great value, blue suede Puma trainers
customer_reviews.text: Cool suede blue, look great, perfect fit and very comfortable and light. Love these Puma trainers. You can’t go wrong for price.
customer_reviews.author: rohint

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft sole but you can feel little stones through them which is a bit annoying
customer_reviews.author: marco

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: A great fit, so glad that I could buy these in a half size, love the colour too and find them great to walk around in.
customer_reviews.author: catherine mearns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My personal favourite puma design/trainer look great and are extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BonzoGonzo

customer_reviews.title: I had a pair of these in the 90s and they are more comfortable now.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely retro trainers. I had a pair of these in the 90s and they are more comfortable now.
customer_reviews.author: James Searby

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Got on an impulse as thought they looked great. They were. I recommend and a reasonable price too.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Nimmo-Tee

customer_reviews.title: As pictured.
customer_reviews.text: A bit big but probably because they are unisex. Other than that they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: VLS

customer_reviews.text: Comfortable fit :) Nice colour and fast delivery, Will be defo buying again!...
customer_reviews.author: Kel

customer_reviews.title: Super light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Super light, comfortable and they look very nice. Usually I'm a size 3.5, ordered a size 3, and they fit perfectly. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Blue suede shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice colour and suede texture, really good quality for the price. Will be great for my holiday.
customer_reviews.author: Alan partridge.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice trainers I only wished that Puma did these in 11.5
customer_reviews.author: OW

customer_reviews.title: I wanted them for work and they're comfortable enough to wear all day for a 12 hour ...
customer_reviews.text: They do the job. I wanted them for work and they're comfortable enough to wear all day for a 12 hour shift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money...well made and fits properly. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money, fits perfectly and are really nice shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Jonathan Neal

customer_reviews.title: Absolute bargain great price for a good quality pair of trainers
customer_reviews.text: Absolute bargain great price for a good quality pair of trainers! Delivery came early as was ordered standard 3-5 days and came in 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great trainers, although the sizing is much more for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great trainers, although the sizing is much more for men. The size 8 had plenty of room - almost too much.
customer_reviews.author: Ms D.

customer_reviews.title: Puma meets Vans with a great price and great results!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these trainers because I thought they were a good composition of puma suedes and vans classic low tops. I really the look of the big vulcanised rubber sole. Once they arrived i found these trainers to be incredibly comfy and also very durable as the suede is not the really soft almost furry kind so they withstand light rain and spills very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Thompson

customer_reviews.title: And they make my feet smell like rotting cheese
customer_reviews.text: The colour isn't as expected. And they make my feet smell like rotting cheese, even after putting trainer tamers in.
customer_reviews.author: cjb

product_meta.title: PUMA 1948 Vulc Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: The Puma 1948 Vulc is a silhouette, an ideal for the everyday usage. Featuring a full Suede upper and a vulcanised outsole, this sneaker goes along with any style.
